caption: The table on the right shows two variables B and C that both have A as their parent. Variable C is functional but variable B is not.
description: This table shows the conditional probability distributions Pr(B|A) and Pr(C|A) given the parent variable A.  The table demonstrates a functional dependency, where variable C is functionally determined by its parent A (Pr(C|A) is deterministic), while variable B is not.
